author: newweiv
content: <@!690224518383534174> are you working on the issue of handling reqs/responses with an event loop? https://github.com/ethereum/trin/issues/102 i was planning to take a stab at it if u were not

author: ogenev
content: Let's discuss this in the issue's thread. When overlay protocol PR gets merged, it will require redesign of the current event handlers to support multiple networks in parallel.
